Description:
We make our way through the camp until we reach a large tent. There we are greeted by Gorio, who welcomes us saying:

(Gorio) "I've heard of you... the werewolf platoon that kills their own kind on the battlefield. Humans will tell you that you're brave... but in reality you are a disgrace to werewolves.

And you Yogger... seeing you on the side of the humans especially pains me. I had high hopes for you.
DescriptionAction: Now I must execute you to set an example."

    "SSRewardText": "(Gorio) \"You are the clear example of what I don't want to happen to my werewolves. More than a wolf, you are a domesticated dog! Surrendered at the feet of humans.\n\nI'll be sure to nail your head to a pike to set an example for the others!\"\n\n(Magnus) \"I'm sorry, but you're stuck in the past, Gorio. The only way to move forward and for there to be a future for werewolves is to coexist with the others. And for that reason, today, here and now, I'm going to put you down.\"",

    "SSRewardText": "(Gorio) \"You say you respect me? Ha! don't make me laugh... So what is the fierce Yogger doing on the side of the humans if you agree with me?\n\nOr is it that perhaps you were looking for a chance to take my place and were afraid to face me in a duel?\"\n\n(Yogger) \"Me? Afraid of you? Don't be ridiculous... You've made a big mistake by provoking humans. Someone like you should have seen coming that we couldn't win in open warfare. I would have done better! What's more, when I'm done with you, maybe I will...\"",
